loveStory.content: We met in the summer of 2015 during a friend's party. Little did we know, it was the beginning of our beautiful journey together.

schedule.content: Join us as we celebrate our love on June 15, 2023. The ceremony will begin at 4:00 PM, followed by a reception at 6:00 PM.

accommodation.content: For our out-of-town guests, we have arranged special rates with nearby hotels. Please check the Accommodation page for details.

guestbook.content: Guestbook or message form content here

faq.content: Have questions? Check out our FAQ section for more information.
